data.message: Where is the pray for Haiti profile piv cover??? Facebook

replies.message: Hi Khalil. After creating the French flag overlay last November during the attacks on Paris, we decided to focus our efforts on creating a profile frames platform that gives nonprofit Pages the ability to create their own frames for fans to show support for a variety of causes. We’re hoping to expand this feature in the coming months in order to allow people to unify behind movements that are important to them. -Colleen
